title: The Metal and Jewellery (Control of Second-Hand) Act
title_en: The Metal and Jewellery (Control of Second-Hand) Act
short_name: Metal and Jewellery (Control of Second-Hand) Act

provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Metal and Jewellery
(Second-hand) (Forms) Regulations. 1947.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. The form of application for a licence to deal in second-hand
metal or in second-hand jewellery shall be in the F m A in the PO-A.
Schedule.

provisions.title: Section 3
provisions.content:
3. The f o m of licence to deal in second-hand metal or in second-
hand jewellery shall be in the F o m B in the Schedule.              F~        B.

provisions.title: Section 4
provisions.content:
4.-41) Every person licensed under the Act to deal in second-hand
metal shall keep a Purchases Book and a Sales Book.
       (2) Every person licensed under the Act to deal in second-hand
jewellery shall keep a Purchases Book and a Sales Book
      (3) Every Purchases Book shall specify-
    (a) the nature and quantity of the article purchased;
    (b) the name and address of the person from whom the article was
        purchw.
    (c) the date and h~utat which such purchase was made;
    (d) whether the vendor was known or was identified to the licensee;
    (e) if tha vendor was ideneed, the name of the person identifying
         such vendor;
    V) the price paid for such article.

        (4) Every Sales Book shall specify-
      (a) the name and address of the person to whom the article was
           sold;
      (b) the date and hour at which the sale was made;
      (c) the price paid for such article;
      (d) the date upon which the article had been purchased by the
           licensee and the person from whom it was purchased.
